Page2
You wake up at your bed…
You hear from your room\'s radio that the global pandemic made humans turn into ZOMBIES.

What will you do? 
 
 1. Call somebody for help. 
 2. Go to the kitchen. 
 3. Go back to sleep. 
 4. Go downstairs and look for people around.
It\'s the start of the game and you\'re already dead… \n You are not good at this.
You decided to go to the kitchen.
But you hear zombies nearby.

What will you do? 
 
 1. Go to the backyard. 
 2. Go to the basement. 
 3. Stay in the kitchen. 
 4. Search for supplies.
Getting yourself trapped in a house with zombies… \n always works…
Going out in the open without any weapons or whatsoever… \n always works…
Getting yourself trapped in a house with zombies… \n always works…
You decided to call somebody for help.

Who do you call? 
 
 1. The police 
 2. Your friend 
 3. Your sibling 
 4. Your parents
You decided to call the police for help…
They eventually answered and instructed you to stay in your house.
%1$s : STAY IN MY HOUSE? \n There are literally zombies BARGING into my house and you\'re telling me to STAY INSIDE, TRAPPED?!
The officer told you to calm down…
You stopped the call and-
You try to call the police but they didn\'t respond…
You decided to call your friend…
Your friend picked up the call. \n but you hear him SCREAMING
and suddenly the call disconnected…
You decided to call your sister…
You hear her crying through the phone.
Sister : W-what should I do?
%1$s : Go find some supplies and find a safe place to stay, okay?
%1$s : Don\'t worry. I\'ll come to you.
-CALL ENDED-
You decided to call your brother…
You hear him hyperventilate and can feel his panic through the phone.
So you try to calm him down.
%1$s : Go find some supplies and find a safe place to stay, okay?
%1$s : Don\'t worry. I\'ll come to you.
-CALL ENDED-
You decided to call your parents…
Mother : %1$s, are you alright?
Father : We\'re safe over here, okay?
You hear some banging on THEIR end of the phone.
Mother : Don\'t worry about us, sweetie. Stay safe and take care of yourself!
-CALL ENDED-
You found a knife and some food.

Where do you go next? 
 
 1. Go to the basement. 
 2. Go to the backyard. 
 3. Go to your room. 
 4. Go outside your house.
Getting yourself trapped in a house with zombies… \n always works…
Going out in the open without any weapons or whatsoever… \n always works…
You suddenly hear zombies banging on your room\'s door.

What will you do? 
 
 1. Fight. 
 2. Jump from your room's window. 
 3. Pray. 
 4. R U N.
You fought the zombies and went outside your house.
You survived the fall.
Fighting zombies without any weapon… What a great idea!
You did not manage the fall.
Really? Did you really think that would work?
Where would you even run to?
On the road, you see someone in a van who\'s not a zombie.

What will you do? 
 
 1. Ask for help. 
 2. Go back to the house. 
 3. Ignore them. 
 4. Go to the supermarket.
Yes… Going back to the zombies where you ESCAPED from is a good idea.
Yeah, fight the zombie horde *ALONE*. THAT\'s a good idea.
You do know that so many people AND zombies are at the supermarket.
They kindly help you and let you in their van.
-CRASH-
But they made an accident and you are now stranded.

What will you do? 
 
 1. Stay in the car. 
 2. Use your food and look for shelter. (Only if you went to the kitchen) 
 3. Fight the zombies. 
 4. Just. Run.
Think, %1$s. Think!
You vs thousands of zombies. \n Seems possible.
I don\'t think you know where to run. \n Do you?
You grabbed your stuff, got out the van and ran to find shelter…
What ever happened to your new \'friend\'? But that doesn\'t matter now, does it?
After running for some time, you find yourself deep in some woods and found a cabin…
You explore in and out of the cabin and found nothing and no one.
You decide to spend your days and nights in the cabin for now…
Well done, you survived the first night of many in the zombie apocalypse.
